snippet: The N.C.A.A. cleared the way for teams to start using a new baseball in 2015 in hopes of increasing the number of runs scored.
abstract: NCAA clears way for college baseball teams to start using a new ball in 2015 in hopes of increasing the number of runs; ball will have flat seams and be similar to the kind used in professional baseball.
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. cleared the way for teams to start using a new baseball in 2015 in hopes of increasing the number of runs scored.
